name: Escape the Room (Josh Contreras)
description:
*Before the game will take commands, the white border right next to the game screen needs to be clicked by the mouse*

Use the arrow keys to move the avatar around the screen

R key resets game after winning

Walking over coins will add them to your inventory, with the game goal being to collect all 40 coins totaling to 400 points.

Walking over the green keys will add them to your inventory, as well as allow you to open the locked green doors.

Lastly, two spaces of the black walls have been rigged to open secret passages, find them if you please!
